extension.searchTitle: To enable concrete masonry products manufacturers to establish, finance, and carry out a coordinated program of research, education, and promotion to improve, maintain, and develop markets for concrete masonry products.; Concrete Masonry Products Research, Education, and Promotion Act of 2015;H.R. 985 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To enable concrete masonry products manufacturers to establish, finance, and carry out a coordinated program of research, education, and promotion to improve, maintain, and develop markets for concrete masonry products.
Concrete Masonry Products Research, Education, and Promotion Act of 2015

extension.shortTitle: Concrete Masonry Products Research, Education, and Promotion Act of 2015
extension.action: Mr. Guthrie (for himself and Ms. Castor of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

Additional sponsors: Mrs. Ellmers of North Carolina, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Butterfield, Mr. Shimkus, Mr. Harper, Mr. Bucshon, Mr. McKinley, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, Mr. Whitfield, Mr. Yarmuth, Mr. Olson, Mr. Huizenga of Michigan, Mr. Ribble, Ms. Moore, Mr. Collins of New York, Mr. Walberg, Mr. Levin, Mr. Graves of Missouri, Mr. Garamendi, Mr. McHenry, Mr. Connolly, Ms. Clark of Massachusetts, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Luetkemeyer, Ms. Brownley of California, Mr. Posey, Mr. Amodei, Mr. Long, Ms. Sinema, Mr. Loebsack, Mr. Meehan, Mr. Hanna, Mr. Lipinski, Mrs. Hartzler, Mr. Huelskamp, Mrs. Brooks of Indiana, Mr. Kinzinger of Illinois, Mr. Rush, Mr. Dent, Mr. King of Iowa, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Benishek, Mr. Murphy of Florida, Mr. Walz, Mr. Conyers, Ms. Esty, Mr. Tiberi, Mrs. Miller of Michigan, Mr. Israel, Mr. Webster of Florida, Mr. Ryan of Ohio, Mr. Neugebauer, Mr. Nolan, Mr. Johnson of Ohio, Mr. Peterson, Mr. Cummings, Ms. Norton, Mr. Miller of Florida, Mr. Ruppersberger, Mr. Van Hollen, Mr. Blum, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Heck of Washington, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Kildee, Mr. Cartwright, Mrs. Carolyn B.
